description:
Dear all Brussels lovers,

If you are interested by World War II and you want to find out more about Belgium during this period, then come to discover Brussels like you have never seen!

Together, we will discover the headquarters where the Germans were occupying the Belgian capital between 28 May 1940 and 2 September 1944.
I will show you many original pictures of Brussels during the occupation.

It will also be my pleasure to explain you many anecdotes about Belgium during the war.

This guided tour will be of course as objective as possible with respect for all participants, in order to not offend anyone!

CU all!

Julien

venue.name: Place Royale, at the entrance of Magritte Museum
venue.address_1: Place Royale, at the entrance of Magritte Museum

name: Discover Brussels during World War II

description:
Dear all Brussels lovers,


If you want to find out more about the story of Belgium, this will be the best occasion during this amazing guided tour, exclusively in the Cinquantenaire park!

Together we will visit the splendid museum of the army and discover many exclusive items, directly related to the history of Belgium.

How come that Belgium became independent in 1831?
Why a so wide variety of cultures in a so small country?
I will do my best to answer to those questions.

The price of 3,00EUR per person includes the guided tour with local guide.

CU!

Julien
name: The Country Belgium Guided Tour

description:
Dear Brussels and chocolate lovers,

This Sunday 28 September I will launch a very original activity for you: Belgium and chocolate, exclusively at the Museum of Cocoa and Chocolate, next to Grand-Place!

Come and discover Belgian chocolate with a chocolate specialist and get an enriching guided tour of the Museum of Cocoa and Chocolate. Don't miss the nice chocolate demonstration by a true chocolate master!
After the museum, get ready for an amazing chocolate tasting and the visit of the most famous boutiques in the heart of Brussels!

In order to prepare the activity and to assure a minimum amount of participants, I would appreciate if you purchase your ticket in advance by bank transfer on following account or via Paypal.

As soon as I receive your payment, you will be officially subscribed.

The price of the event includes the guided tour with a chocolate specialist, the entrance of the museum, the chocolate tasting and the visit of the boutiques.


For your bank transfer:

Julien Vanhoutte

BE[masked]


For you Paypal transfer:


[masked]

Many thanks and CU there!

Chocolately yours, 

Julien
name: Discover Belgian Chocolate

name: Discover Brussels during World War II

description:
Dear Brussels lovers,


Everyday you are walking in the narrow streets of Brussels, crossing streets, having a waffle on Grand-Place without even imagining one second what happened years and centuries agoGrand-Place was the main place for public executions, a stream called "the Senne" was flowing in front of the current "Bourse" and on Place St-Gery, one of the most horrible murders of the city took place there 150 years ago!Everyday we are passing by those interesting spots and noticing some symbols and on this Sunday, it will be my pleasure to make live those places and to give sense to those symbols.

In order to organize this event, I would appreciate if you can pay your admission in advance via PayPal or by transfer.

PayPal: [masked]

ING: Julien Vanhoutte  BE[masked]

Thank you!


CU all!


Julien
how_to_find_us: At the entrance of the Town Hall
name: Secrets of Brussels: A Thrilling Guided Tour
